## Basic steps
-	Download the data from **Kobo** using the same format **.XLS**. You should select **XML values and headers**
- Filter according to the date, and refugee_settlement or district/subcounty
- Sort by enumerator
- separate the start and end columns into their hours, minutes, and seconds
- Get time interval of the survey
- Get time interval between surveys
